topHero.title: Need help with your research?
topHero.subtitle: From statistical tests and data analyses, to tutorials and research consultations, we got your back.

services.title: Select from our variety of services.

cards.title: Research Consultation
cards.description: Meet with our consultants via Zoom or Google Meet to answer your inquiries regarding your research

cards.title: Data Analysis
cards.description: We perform statistical analysis services for your data, providing you with complete and interpreted tables and figures that could help you attain your research objectives.

cards.title: Tutorial Services
cards.description: Enroll in our one-on-one or group online tutorials in Math and Statistics.

cards.title: VIP Services
cards.description: Get hands-on assistance in your research from start to end of your research journey.

numbers.text: Clients served from more than 100 academic and healthcare institutions

entries.message: Altabay Solutions - great assistance in the 2 researches needed for my diplomate and fellowship requirements. Professional and client friendly. I think its a must - to ask for their help with complicated research methodologies and statistics. Thank you and God bless!
entries.name: Henry Mina

entries.message: Altabay Solutions was such a huge help in making our research statistically sound. Very patient, and sessions are always high yield. They will help you understand concepts that may be difficult to grasp. 10/10 would recommend!
entries.name: Ella Lagman

entries.message: Altabay Solutions helped me find out what I have to work on, with detailed explanation and visual representations. It was really great help to me when I really needed it. üòä Thank you so much and God bless you!
entries.name: Eun Grace Kim
